original_text: Then Jesus got back into the boat. He sailed across to the other side of the lake again. He went to Capernaum, the town where he was living.
korean_text: 예수께서 배에 오르사 건너가 본 동네에 이르시니

sentences.original_text: Then Jesus got back into the boat
He sailed across to the other side of the lake again
the town where he was living
